checkboxGroup.checkbox3: Allow only administrator to create folders

second.title: Sign in
second.radioGroupInfo: If there is an existing LDAP (or Active Directory) established in-house, user account in the company can be easily managed by linking with Cloudike.
second.autoSignOutInfo: You can set the automatic sign out time for users who have not been used for a certain period of time.

checkboxGroup.checkbox2: Allow the use of mobile application

settings.label: Company cloud terms and conditions
settings.title: Settings
settings.settingsInfo: If you select the Company cloud terms and conditions ofuse, your team members must agree to the terms and conditions when they sign in to use the cloud service.

customSettings.upload_terms: You can only upload png, jpeg. bmp, and gif files (265px X 85px)

editor.placeholder: Please enter the terms and conditions

validation.required: The terms and conditions can't be empty

change_super_admin.modal_info: If you change the super administrator, your current account is no longer super administrator. In addition , your account will be automatically signed out.

confirm_super_admin.modal_info: Your current account will no longer be a company administrator and automatically signed out. This command is irreversible. Would you like to continue?
confirm_super_admin.submitErrorMessage: Can not realized change super admin

change_middle_admin.modal_info: The selected team member is designated as the middle administrator. Middle administrators have the same authorities as super administrator, but can not change super administrator. If you want to relieve of the middle administrator, press again and click the button below.
change_middle_admin.submitErrorMessage: Can not realized change middle admin
change_middle_admin.messageNoSelectedUser: Please select at least one user
